question: FB set to launch WhatsApp Pay with how many major banks in India?
explanation: Facebook will be launching Whatsapp Pay , a payment service for its whatsapp platform. It will be partnering with HDFC, AXIS, ICICI and SBI banks. A pilot version of Whatsapp Pay has started in February with 1 million users in India. The active usage is estimated to be 20 times more than Paytm's.
